attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Create Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 MDT configuration for hardware inventory/state: stream inventory entities and platform slot instance state. Use gRPC no TLS. Collector 192.0.2.196 port 57500. Sample every 10 minutes."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
{"response": "telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group HW-INVENTORY-STATE
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-plat-chas-invmgr-oper:inventory/entities/entity
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-plat-chas-invmgr-oper:platform/slot-instances/slot-instance
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.196
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-HW-INVENTORY-STATE
  sensor-group-id HW-INVENTORY-STATE sample-interval 600000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"}
